list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you stay here and I'll be back soon
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn ở lại đây và tôi sẽ quay lại sớm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remain in a specified state or position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khả năng giữ bình tĩnh của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) live somewhere temporarily as a visitor or guest.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the girls had gone to stay with friends
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cô gái đã đi ở lại với bạn bè

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: stop, delay, or prevent (something), in particular suspend or postpone (judicial proceedings) or refrain from pressing (charges).
secure or steady (a mast) by means of stays.
a period of staying somewhere, in particular of living somewhere temporarily as a visitor or guest.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an overnight stay at a luxury hotel
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ở lại một đêm tại một khách sạn sang trọng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device used as a brace or support.
a large rope, wire, or rod used to support a ship's mast, leading from the masthead to another mast or spar or down to the deck.
